docs.snippet: The move ends Alex Rodriguez’s campaign to fight his ban for using performance-enhancing drugs and means he will miss all of the 2014 season....
docs.lead_paragraph: The move ends Alex Rodriguez’s campaign to fight his ban for using performance-enhancing drugs and means he will miss all of the 2014 season.
docs.abstract: New York Yankees third baseman Alex Rodriguez effectively ends his yearlong battle with Major League Baseball, dropping lawsuits against league and players union over his doping suspension; move means that Rodriguez has accepted his yearlong suspension, longest in sport's history for the use of performance-enhancing drugs.

headline.main: Rodriguez Drops Suits Against Baseball and Union
headline.print_headline: Rodriguez Drops Lawsuits Against Baseball, Selig and Players Union

docs.snippet: Unconventional methods like meditation and “sudden-death drills” have helped propel a group of athletes to the top of their sport....
docs.lead_paragraph: Unconventional methods like meditation and “sudden-death drills” have helped propel a group of athletes to the top of their sport.
docs.abstract: Unusual methods employed by 82-year-old Columbia University fencing coach Aladar Kogler, such as meditation, have helped propel school's fencing team to top ranking in nation.

headline.main: No. 1 Columbia Fencers Are Aided by ‘Jedi Master’
